title: PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/usr/bin'

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: This issue or pull request already exists

body:
## Component Versions

- **Video2X release version**: 4.3.1
- **Upscaler version**: 4.4.1
- **CLI version**: 4.3.1

## Symptom

Upscaling a gif results in an error while converting frames to gif.
Error occurred when I ran `video2x -i input.gif  -o test.gif -r 2`
also happens when using sudo
I didn't make any changes to any configs

## Error Log or Screenshots
```
[+] INFO: Upscaling completed
[+] INFO: Average processing speed: 1.9955688166204466 seconds per frame
[+] INFO: Lanczos downscaling frames

Downscaling:   0%|          | 0/4 [00:00<?, ?it/s]
Downscaling: 100%|##########| 4/4 [00:00<00:00, 612.73it/s]
[+] INFO: Converting extracted frames into GIF image
2021-04-25 17:43:35.803423 [+] INFO: Executing: ['/usr/bin', '-o', '/home/thefel0x/test.gif', '--fps', '10', '--width', '440', '--height', '440', '--quality', '100', '/var/tmp/video2x/tmpekmusah4/extracted_*.png']
Cleaning up cache directory: /var/tmp/video2x/tmpgl6gszvt
Cleaning up cache directory: /var/tmp/video2x/tmpekmusah4
Cleaning up cache directory: /var/tmp/video2x
[!] ERROR: An exception has occurred
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/video2x", line 342, in <module>
    upscaler.run()
  File "/usr/share/video2x/upscaler.py", line 1022, in run
    raise e
  File "/usr/share/video2x/upscaler.py", line 919, in run
    gifski_object.make_gif(
  File "/usr/share/video2x/wrappers/gifski.py", line 52, in make_gif
    return self._execute(execute)
  File "/usr/share/video2x/wrappers/gifski.py", line 82, in _execute
    return subprocess.Popen(execute, stdout=sys.stdout, stderr=sys.stderr)
  File "/usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py", line 951, in __init__
    self._execute_child(args, executable, preexec_fn, close_fds,
  File "/usr/lib/python3.9/subprocess.py", line 1821, in _execute_child
    raise child_exception_type(errno_num, err_msg, err_filename)
PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/usr/bin'
```
